resources.string: Login using your google account and \n Auth0 will provide an secure Token to \n view your heart rate.

This application is designed to monitor your heart rate and store in the cloud for your health care provider to track your heart health and provide proactive advice.


Please go to the next page to register and login your information. Your heart rate device will have an unique, please post that in the window 


This is a secure application providing multi-factor authentication for you to able to log your metrics
